website_summaries.verdict: Look forward to fresh food for lunch with this 16-quart capacity insulated lunch box, designed to keep your food colder for longer.
pros: 16-quart capacity box featuring MaxCold, extra foam to keep contents colder for longer
Leak-resistant, anti-microbial lining also ensures food freshness
Separate insulated compartment on top, easy-grip, ergonomic handle, zipper-secure side pockets, and handy shoulder strap
cons: Check dimensions before purchasing to avoid ambiguity and plan accordingly
Doesn't fit easily in refrigerator, so pack refrigerated food right before use

customer_reviews.title: Zipper doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: For years, I owned and used the previous version of this lunch box/cooler daily for work. After many years the zipper finally busted. I owned this particular version for about a year and the zippers have already busted in two places (the corners). Igloo, send all remaining lunch boxes of this version to North Korea (they won’t know any better) and start making the previous version again.
customer_reviews.author: TyrantCS

customer_reviews.title: worse than my 11 year old one
customer_reviews.text: I found this so warped and mis-shaped that it is literally useless- its worse than the one I am replacing it with that I used for 11 years!!!! this must have sat under a huge heap of heavy objects and does not hold a shape at all- it might as well be a sandwich wrap!!!! Total crap, never again Iglo!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: K. C.

customer_reviews.title: Quality going downhill on this one
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. For a major name-branded product, the quality seems to have degraded. I loved the first one I had, and took it to work every day for a few years. So I wasn't surprised when the zipper finally gave out. I liked the first one well enough to buy the exact same replacement in November, but now it's only April and the fabric placket (either side of the zipper) is already tearing. Unfortunately there is only a two-month return window, and it didn't start ripping until just over four months. Another thing I'd noticed: It's not nearly as sturdy as the old one. The walls tend to sag. I guess I'll be looking to a different manufacturer this time.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J. Hesse

customer_reviews.title: Good Cooler
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a lunch cooler for everyday use and a replacement for a worn-out cooler almost exactly like it. It is very well insulated and the zippers are good quality and work smoothly. The only thing I would change is the main compartment isn't as tall as the cooler it replaced and when we have a bottled drink, that inch or so would come in handy. But the overall main compartment size is bigger and that's really nice. Worth the money and works very well.
customer_reviews.author: UncommonSenseSC

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it I had this cooler before and needed a replacement after a few years of carrying it to work every day. This does not meet the standards I expected. The side zipper was sewn in badly and you had to hold it a special way just to get it to zip. The cloth on the main zipper ripped in a couple of weeks. I think these are irregular buys from the manufacturer and not worth the money. It is now in the trash and I have gone to a completely different brand.
customer_reviews.author: BootsyM

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lunchbox, carry strap placement could be better
customer_reviews.text: The carry strap for this lunchbox could be better. It attaches to the domed flip-top, so if you forget to zip the thing closed and pick it up, the contents of your lunchbox end up on the floor. Otherwise its great - keeps things cold or cool with a single blue gel, even on 12-hour shifts and even on days when my transit but cabin temp is running in the mid-80s. The separate storage in the domed lid is handy for condiments, plasticware, and napkins - things that don't care what temp they're at, that you don't want in the main compartment. Interior is easy to clean and lined with heavy plastic of some sort.
customer_reviews.author: DMW

customer_reviews.title: Good cooler/lunch box.
customer_reviews.text: I have used Playmate Maxcold 16 as lunch boxes for years. When one wears out I just buy a new one. They work great for me. This latest one is fine for the most part (thick durable material, keeps everything cool, etc) but I wish they had a better quality zipper. Not only it feels a bit too light duty for this cooler but it already got stock twice in about a month since I bought the cooler. I almost broke it trying to get it unstock. I worry it will not hold up for two long. Obviously the cooler is unusable if zipper breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: lasted 10 months both zippers fell apart
customer_reviews.text: pretty good lunch bag although the shoulder strap was not my style so I had to cut it off now it's kind of Ripped but still a good lunch bag they should make the shoulder strap removable most guys are not going to want to carry their lunch bag around like a purse::: update 10 months later both zippers have fallen apart bag is now useless it should of lasted at least a couple years. live and learn.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Great lunch box
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lunch box for work or school. It offers lots of room. One side of the top unzips and is useful for those items you do not want cold like bread, chips, even your silverware. I use one freezer pack on the bottom, things stay cold all day, and the pack is still partially solid when I return home with it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy R.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and roomy, well insulated
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this cooler. He got one of the same about 15 years ago and used it through the ground, for all sorts of things (hiking, beach, soccer and baseball games, lunch every day...). The zipper on the old one ended up going, but it still held the chill all that time and we like that it has the upper level for things that need to be dry and contained but not necessarily cold, and it all wipes out so easily. Very excited for this second generation!
customer_reviews.author: LuckyMommy

customer_reviews.title: Holds Everything / Keeps Cold
customer_reviews.text: I got this because it is sized/shaped like the old, ubiquitous hard-shell Playmate in a modern, soft-shell package. I have many lunch-reheat containers that were too large for my little six-pack cooler. This fills the bill and then some. Nice touch of the mesh pouch under the lid -- that's where I slide my blue ice pack. As one past reviewer noted, the shoulder sling is not removeable without cutting it off. I'm almost to the point of that minor 'surgery' but still want to leave myself the shoulder option for now.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Weak point?  The zipper ultimately.
customer_reviews.text: My wife used this for work and at first it seemed too big, but eventually she got used to that. After 2.5 years, the zipper finally gave way. (Isn't that always the way? A perfectly good something getting tossed because of a cheap zipper?) Would that someone would invent another way of fastening things that didn't need to be completely ripped apart in order to change it out.
customer_reviews.author: Just a Putz in WI

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size & light weight; accommodates meal prepping
customer_reviews.text: Holds up well as this is my second one on 3 years. It's lightweight and is the perfect size for lunches. Given that is a flexible material, it allows a little stretching to accommodate meal prep trays. It's cleanable, but like any other non-hard sided cooler is not the easiest to clean. Tradeoff between perfect size/weight/flexible material and easy cleaning. Overall very pleased with the cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Angie's reads

customer_reviews.title: Good little cooler
customer_reviews.text: This is a good little cooler for what it is. We use it mostly to take drinks to social events. We bought It to replace a similar one that we used for the same purpose. It holds the promised amount plus a couple of ice packs and it keeps our drinks cold for several hours. We haven't tried to use it all day in the hot sun so I can't say how well it performs under those circumstances.
customer_reviews.author: L. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: got a great handle why do you want a strap
customer_reviews.text: A well made lunch box. This is a replacement for an older model of the same manufacturer, the new one does not have the velcro closure in the lid top webbing so it makes that part difficult to use with items placed there falling back out when you close the lid. Also the strap is nothing but a hindrance that gets in the way, first thing I do is cut this off, got a great handle why do you want a strap? Your only carrying your lunch, it's not that heavy! My recommendation, spend the money you save by not putting on the strap back into making the lid top webbing securable.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Dressler

customer_reviews.title: Ripped one month after purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt keep my lunch that cold, and started to rip after a month. Cheaply made. Trash, really.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: NICE BUT DIDN’T LAST
customer_reviews.text: REVISED- After just a few months, the handle broke off with normal wear and tear. My son (5th grade) wanted an igloo lunch box. This arrived and well, it was WAY to big for that purpose. My husband on the other hand decided it was just right for him as he takes lunch and water bottles and snacks. Nice product and good compartment for dry items.
customer_reviews.author: PCL

customer_reviews.title: Previous version is MUCH better than this one.
customer_reviews.text: THe zipper on this igloo is too fine and doesn't work very well. THe previous version had a more coarse zipper and was easier to use. Also the strap on the previuos one was attached to the bottom portion so it was easier to unzip and access while carrying the cooler. Igloo should go back to prvious design.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Walden

customer_reviews.title: not sturdy at all it's collapsing already after just a week or tow
customer_reviews.text: I'm not happy with the item..... had the same thing before and it lasted for a long time. This one is collapsing after just a week or two, don;t know if it's a reject or what? I think it should be replaced but i don;t want to go thru the problem with sending it back and all so I'll just keep it, but i'm not that happy with it........
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: Its what you take to work every day. Keeps your food correct till it is time for lunch.
customer_reviews.text: No issues with this product. This is the 3rd one I have owned. They last about 3 years, give or take. The zipper goes to pot on them. I have a serving dish's that fit these perfectly. A bottle of water and fruit in the main compartment. Top, cookies and personal items. Shoulder strap makes it easy to travel on foot.
customer_reviews.author: PC Scooter

customer_reviews.title: I am going to try to repair it with fabric glue to keep it from getting worse.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this 4 days a week for about a month and the areas near the strap cooler joint is showing signs of tear and dont kniw how long beforr it will come off. I dont carry much weight in the cooler but use it as my lunch box. It does do well with keeping cold with one ice pack. No problems otherwise. I am going to try to repair it with fabric glue to keep it from getting worse.
customer_reviews.author: bmw3min

customer_reviews.title: Low quality product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cooler in 2017 and in one year of lite use the zipper began to break and come unstiched. After contacting Igloo to see if there was anything they could do I was informed that since it was out of the warranty period they would not repair it. This damage was not from anything I did but from obvious shoddy workmanship. I would not recommend purchasing this product or any other product made by Igloo. They have chosen to move their manufacturing overseas and skimp on quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, heavy helper
customer_reviews.text: This is so lightweight it's like a feather! My husband is a big eater though so this is perfect for his lunch for work. He works in coal, and I have no trouble keeping this clean. He really likes the fact that it has the sturdy handle plus the over the shoulder handle.
customer_reviews.author: Eve Green

customer_reviews.title: Will not purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I had a previous version of this cooler bag donated to me by a friend who used it for years. I used it for years before the zipper failed. This newer version of the same bag is falling apart in less than a year of use. The metal pull tab for the top compartment broke in half leaving just a stub to use to open and close the zipper. The material is fraying and falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: all99me

customer_reviews.title: My food travel bag
customer_reviews.text: It is almost like an older Igloo one we have and love. We just needed a new one. I take it on the plane with me and use it to hold my homemade frozen Italian food for my grandson. It is strong and stores a lot and easy to handle on the plane. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: almawnj3

customer_reviews.title: Improvement badly Needed
customer_reviews.text: After four of the same cooler/lunch boxes. Two had broken zipper one stitching (this one). If the manufacturer is reading this it a good cooler in terms of size and form factor but both zippers have to be significantly more robust and strong(think winter jacket strong) and instead of a side top zipper many have a happy face zipper. I and many others don't use the top for food but for pens/note pads/cell charger/medicine and iPad(now on bottom)the rest is food. Thank you for your consideration.
customer_reviews.author: Julia m

customer_reviews.title: What a great cooler! Best lunchbox I've owned.
customer_reviews.text: The design elements of this Igloo cooler make it perfect for any number of applications. It's a great size for packing everything you'd want for lunch in the main compartment. The mesh on the underside of the top/lid section is perfect for inserting a flat ice pack to keep everything cold without its frozen weight smushing sandwiches or fruit. The lid and handle section has another compartment which is perfect to store chips or other items that you want to protect since the whole top section is semi-rigid.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Barnhart

customer_reviews.title: A must have for construction workers! Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: My husbands in construction & drives a semi. This is perfect for just that. He can fit a large ice pack (5”x7”), 2 sandwich containers, drinks and even more snacks/chips on the top portion. Very well made. Considering buying another to have on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: The best work lunchtime lunchbox!!
customer_reviews.text: I had the previous version of this Igloo Playmate. I made the mistake of trying to replace it with another brand I find locally. I did this ONLY because I thought I needed a new work cooler. The replacement brand didn’t make it two days before I was back on Amazon looking for my Igloo Playmate Max Cold!! I WILL NOT MAKE THAT MISTAKE AGAIN!!
customer_reviews.author: JWookie

customer_reviews.title: keeps things cool
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product. I put an ice pack in the main chamber which kept the drinks and other food really cool but it also kept the food in the top pouch cool as well. This was really worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: katie mcgraw

customer_reviews.title: SO IMPRESSED
customer_reviews.text: this is absolutely worth every penny. I cannot believe how cheap and fast this came in. It holds a 6 pack plus a can of pringles up top, a pudding, an orange. 2 sandwiches and an apple or orange. This is great
customer_reviews.author: Jamie kanan

customer_reviews.title: IGLOO lunch box: good value
customer_reviews.text: The Igloo lunch box is a good purchase. It is well made. It has great storage in the top lid and in the main compartment. The zippers hold up nicely. The straps sometimes pull away a little from where attached but he uses it daily and it takes a lot of abuse. We usually buy another one after about 1-2 years to make sure he's never without one. A favorite for many years-good design, well made and good value.
customer_reviews.author: Persistentone

customer_reviews.title: Nice lunchbox
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I would change on this is to have a hard bottom. It kind of folds in the middle with heavier lunches. I cut a piece of plexiglass to fit in the bottom and it works great now.
customer_reviews.author: billy

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: This is an example of the pitfalls of buying on line. The zipper has a bad area that drags when I close it. Opening, not so bad. I wouldn't have bought this particular item. I've had two in the past and really like them so I'm putting up with the zipper issue.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Scheibler

customer_reviews.title: Unraveling in Less than 6 months
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this lunch box everyday to take to the office and it has started fraying in less than 6 months. We bought the protection plan and cannot use it....very disappointed in the quality and protection plan.....
customer_reviews.author: Puckett

customer_reviews.title: Large enough for two meals at work.
customer_reviews.text: This lunch bag is great because I can fit two meals, snacks and ice packs in it for my long work shifts. Don't over stuff it though or you'll wear out the zippers. Didn't rate how easy it is to clean because I haven't had to yet.
customer_reviews.author: Weezie

customer_reviews.title: Quality of material is really cheaper than previous one I ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality of material is really cheaper than previous one I own, which I needed to replace because its zipper finally broke. If I find who can fix the zipper, I will definitely keep using the old one.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Husband approved
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this thing! He wanted something he could carry his lunch and drinks in. This is a big lunch box but exactly what he wanted. Great value and he has no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Ke44

customer_reviews.title: Great for transporting lunch!
customer_reviews.text: This is like my fourth “lunch pail” in 10 years lol! I love this brand and design. It’s just the right amount of space and with regular ice, stays cold for numerous hours. I use this for my lunch and several bottles of water everyday for lunch. The upper compartment is great for syoring cutlery, napkins, condiments, etc. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A. Flood

customer_reviews.title: Zipper not so good
customer_reviews.text: Cooler is great except the zipper breaks easily. We have had 2 break in less than 2 years. If you don't mind purchasing them annually then it does keep things well insulated. I would like to get a least 2 years out of it at that price point.
customer_reviews.author: kitchendiva

customer_reviews.title: Used my first one until it was eaten by the dog
customer_reviews.text: This is my second of this box. It is amazing and never lets me down. The extra storage areas are very convenient as well. I strongly recommend this product and the seller
customer_reviews.author: Scott Logsdon

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Perfect lunch box.
customer_reviews.text: Great lunch box. It holds everything without getting the sandwich squashed. The upper compartment holds snacks (cookies). Plenty of room to hold 2 or 3 bottles of water.
customer_reviews.author: Meemaw

customer_reviews.title: Falls Apart
customer_reviews.text: I replaced this for my husband, who had previously had the same kind for YEARS with no issues. This one started falling apart after barely a year, conveniently in time for the 1-year warranty to run out. Will not buy again, as we've already had to replace it! AGAIN! If we wanted to buy a new lunchbox every year, we'd go with something cheaper. Igloo is supposed to be a good brand with a good reputation, but they're cutting corners and it shows.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer O

customer_reviews.title: Better than the older model
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my old igloo with this one, zipper failed, this one has two zippers !! And pockets on both sides and the bottom part is fully insulated, nice upgrade !
customer_reviews.author: m j D'Angelo

customer_reviews.title: The sturdy grip handle makes it easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: I think it's great. Easy to carry, sturdy durable. Keeps my lunch cold. Has two side storage pockets to keep other small snacks in or other things like a comb or set of car keys and other small items. Roomy enough to probably keep a 12 pack of 12 oz cans in there if needed. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: robert robinson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect work cooler
customer_reviews.text: I love this cooler. The only negative I can find is that it doesn't keep stuff cold as long as my old all plastic igloo. Otherwise this is a perfect size for 3 drinks, my 2 igloo ice blocks, my lunch, and snacks for my work day. It also has many pockets for other things also.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Lee Teagardner

customer_reviews.title: Sadly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We had the lunch box only a month with light use and already the strap has detached from the lunch box. I was so dissapointed since igloo usually had such a good product. Hopefully it's just a defective one and everyone else has better luck ,
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: I like the separate area for dry items and the two outside pockets, great for slipping in your phone, keys, papers etc. It's a little larger than I'm used to but overall I'm happy. One thing I don't care for is the location of the shoulder straps, they get in the way of the zipper, wish they were right below the zippers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, But Not Great
customer_reviews.text: This lunch box was a great size and got the job done for me. Unfortunately after going through two of them over approximately 2 years, I will be going with a different brand and spending more money in hopes of finding better durability. The zipper broke on the first lunch box. The seams ripped right above the zipper, where the upper compartment is located on my second lunch box. For the current list price of $17.99 it isn't a bad price. I used this on average 5 days a week.
customer_reviews.author: M A

customer_reviews.title: Works well with ice packs.
customer_reviews.text: For me, the strap gets in the way sometimes. I use 2 igloo ice packs and everything stays really cold from 7am-1pm. Items still pretty chilled at 4pm. You definitely need ice packs to keep stuff cold for a day long activity. WORKS GREAT FOR ME!!
customer_reviews.author: Willis Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and extra compartment above the larger area. We had to send one back due to a faulty zipper, but the new one works great. I also like the light weight of this cooler.
customer_reviews.author: NW

customer_reviews.title: Too small and fell apart
customer_reviews.text: Liked the previous model...this one is a little too small. Always struggling to close it. After 7 mos...both zipper pulls came off track within a week of each other. Now I've got junk.
customer_reviews.author: floyd48383

customer_reviews.title: Durable lunchbox but watch the threads!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great durable lunchbox with two compartments. It is great for a commuter or someone who packs his/her breakfast, lunch, or dinner. Let’s not forget about snacks! However, I’m noticing some of the fibers and/or threads are now coming off. You’ll have to cut them because they look undone.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina R.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: If you're interested in getting this maxcold cooler look elsewhere. Thus is my 2nd one in the past 3 month's including a replacement. The straps are ripped and coming apart. The price is priced low for a reason.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I did not read the description before purchasing and it was a lot bigger than expected. But overall the cooler is very nice and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Randi sterling

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how much you can say about a lunchbox but we are very happy with the purchase. It’s roomy, keeps our drinks cool. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: MgabyPL

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and durable
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for the money. Much more durable than others that looks similar. The walls stand up nicely. They don't fold or Crush over like some other cheaper ones
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: No more igloos
customer_reviews.text: Not what they used to be. Had to cut off shoulder strap to open and close easily. Zipper broke. Small and cheap looking. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: jerry mauney

customer_reviews.title: Newer model is cheaper in quality - avoid
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item because my previous one lasted nearly 5 years. Well, this model lasted 32 days before a zipper issue and tearing near the seam. Needless to say I will be contacting Igloo for a refund or replacement with another model. Plus, I can not take off the strap like I could with the other model and don't use it. The quality has definitely gone down with Igloo and will be avoiding this particular model in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Stucco

customer_reviews.title: 12 pack of soda plus the igloo ice packs, 18 hours and still cold
customer_reviews.text: This is the 5th one of these I have had over the last 15 years or so. I will be sad if they stop making them. It is perfect for my everyday use for work and play
customer_reviews.author: Chevcad

customer_reviews.title: It sweats, and could leave you a puddle.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good cooler, but it sweats in the heat. If I leave this on my truck floorboard in the heat, I will have a puddle. I don’t like the plastic ice packs, but using regular ice leaves a mess. I’ll be looking for something else for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Church Sound Guy

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Plenty of Room!
customer_reviews.text: Put a couple packs of ice in it and it keeps stuff cold all day long. Plenty of room, pockets and compartments. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: angelo

customer_reviews.title: DON’T BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: This would have been a good lunch bow, however in an attempt to save money (apparently)...they took out the plastic liner. This sucks because with the storage being on top, the lunch bow falls over unless it’s full. Biggest POS, I threw it away!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kris Grzywa

customer_reviews.title: Decent buy
customer_reviews.text: Decent lunch box. Has hold up pretty good now for several months. It's a little smaller than my old one but I'm used to it
customer_reviews.author: JORDAN BONNEMA

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler
customer_reviews.text: My husband is gone all day for work and needs to bring his own food. This cooler is great and lasted for a little over 2 years with daily, heavy use. It's a little bulky, but the amount of food that fits in there still amazes me :D anyways, hubby loved it so much that we replaced it with the same exact one and hopefully this one will last just as long!
customer_reviews.author: Mara

customer_reviews.title: It is fantastic that it has two compartments
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this for his work lunch box. It is fantastic that it has two compartments. It is very large though. Only complaint is that there are not outer pockets.
customer_reviews.author: S.M.M.

customer_reviews.title: Strap Failure
customer_reviews.text: Straps started tearing away from bag after just a couple months. Already in the garbage. Too bad because the insulation was good.
customer_reviews.author: D.B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Lunch box
customer_reviews.text: Great Lunch box...like the upper compartment for other stuff to carry. Zippers are the thing that wears out first...but usually last at least a year of heavy wear. This is my 3rd or 4th of the same style MaxCold. Good box for work...I always cut off the strap with a razor blade...only need the handle.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great lunch pail
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lunch pail. My husband uses this every day and it takes a beating but it keeps on doing the job. He loves that this pail has several compartments-- upper, lower and pockets in between. Very spacious and the fact that it sits upright is a big plus. This is a very durable and quality craftsmanship is evident. I will buy this again when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: anna hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke after four months.
customer_reviews.text: I really wasn't impressed with Igloo this time. The zipper broke after four months of regular use. The one I had before that was a Coleman that lasted years.
customer_reviews.author: killface

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and durable
customer_reviews.text: This was to replace an identical model for my husband. Hope it holds up as well as the original!
customer_reviews.author: A. McCeney

customer_reviews.title: Great size fits in most golf carts
customer_reviews.text: We use it for golf outings keeps things cold, but we do put frozen ice packs in. Great size
customer_reviews.author: B. J. Skurdal

customer_reviews.title: solid gift choice
customer_reviews.text: a great gift for father in law. a lot of storage and stays nice and cold for long periods . we bought two in 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed that I wasted my hard earned money.
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these Igloos and used for my lunch for work. I used it every day for over four years and I loved it. I loved it so much that I bought another one just like it because it is perfect for what I use it for. The new one is not the same quality. After 3 months of use, it has already started to fall apart. Unfortunately the return period has already expired. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: William Hart

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Ample storage, does everything everything it’s supposed to do like keeping drinks cold for several hours. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: herbert melaugh

customer_reviews.title: The zipper to my 1st bag went bad, so I purchased this 2nd bag
customer_reviews.text: Bag keeps my lunch/dinner cold for over 14 hours. The zipper to my 1st bag went bad, so I purchased this 2nd bag. Would purchase again, but would prefer a detachable shoulder harness.
customer_reviews.author: VP

customer_reviews.title: A Great Cooler, But Has A Flimsy Zipper
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved the MaxCold cooler; it is spacious, keeps the contents cool for hours on end and the canopy top is great for storing items you might not want stored directly on your ice pack, etc. The negative . . . and it is something I observed with my last purchase . . . is that the zipper is so frail/flimsy, I worry that it won't last long. It used to be made of tougher material. Still, it is an excellent cooler and one I have purchased many times down through the years.
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality product, also very cheap but there is no enough information about size. They could add more picture and information. It is really big.
customer_reviews.author: Sevgi

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: I do not like this bag, Good size but zipper does not work well. Falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: rockford1

customer_reviews.title: Keeps everything cold.
customer_reviews.text: It is larger than I expected, it’s the right size for a larger amount of food or drinks. It also keeps my food cold for a 8 hour shift with one large ice pack. I like the smaller top zip compartment for snacks and silverware.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Well I haven’t had much luck buying stuff from amazon. This is the second item that I have bought in a week that is pure garbage!! I just got this lunch bag for work and it’s already falling apart
customer_reviews.author: Ibrahim Spahalic

customer_reviews.title: Faulty zipper
customer_reviews.text: This is my 5th lunch pale exactly like this one. This is the first one I’ve had that the zipper broke on day two. The other zipper is fine so I’ll work around it. They last me nearly 4-5 months using everyday at work where it gets beat up and dirty all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Geno

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my husband to bring lunch to work
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my husband to bring lunch to work. Keeps food and drinks cold from home to the fridge at work. Have never used it to keep something cold for more than a few hours so I cannot comment on how long it will keep items cold. Holds up well to being thrown in the truck and has a nice zippered spot on top to keep things dry like silverware and napkins.
customer_reviews.author: vt mama

customer_reviews.title: Works Well as a lunch pail.
customer_reviews.text: The zipper tends to be weak & wears out long before the Playmate itself.
customer_reviews.author: logigirl

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I wanted the black one cause it looks better. I wouldn't have bought this one.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Bad Zippers
customer_reviews.text: In general, I am happy with the bag. However, the zippers are already failing after one month
customer_reviews.author: Luitgi

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't ask for a better lunch boxs!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband had this lunch boxs for 5+ years and used it 6 days a wk and the zipper broke and he wanted the same one and we couldn't find it in store so I was glad that I could find it on here.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Great lunchbox!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an identical one that I’d used for several years. It’s a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product. I found the strap to get in ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. I found the strap to get in the way a lot so I just cut it off! Other than that minor annoyance it holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: 19GT65

customer_reviews.title: Too big for a 6 grader.
customer_reviews.text: My son had 2 shorter maxcold lunch box from playschool to fifth grade. The Igloo is high quality so I ordered this bigger box for sixth grade and on, but it was huge, and the long handle on top was not very supporting. I returned it and got one from Costco.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Good lunchbox
customer_reviews.text: This bbn is a good spacious lunchbox. It is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Hansonzg

customer_reviews.title: Strong and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Strong and sturdy! It holds the shape so well although it is bigger than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: good size lunch box
customer_reviews.text: this is my second cooler....I wore the first one out. The bottom section is large enough for real size plastic food containers which allows you to keep them flat, inside of jamming them in sideways like other smaller coolers/lunch bags. It can store my lunch containers as well as my breakfast containers. The top section is good storage as well. I use it to keep my two eye glass cases, my ipod and headphones and there still is extra room. several of us at work have these and they work out well.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, built to last and well insulated.
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these for close to 6 years, only reason I replaced it was cause I left it in the garage with some fruits in it for a week and was not going to try to clean it. This is a very sturdy and great lunch box.
customer_reviews.author: francisco amial

customer_reviews.title: Product is ok
customer_reviews.text: Not as big as I expected but very durable and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Very poorly made. I had the exact same model ...
customer_reviews.text: Very poorly made. I had the exact same model and it lasted 4 years. The stitching around the zipper is very weak and the zipper tucks in and gets caught up when zipping.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Sharrard

customer_reviews.title: Great lunch cooler!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for packing lunch plus a few snacks & drinks. Keeps everything cold for hours (with an ice pack). Handy storage in the cover for napkins, utensils, etc. This is replacing a previous version that I used daily for many years until the zipper failed.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Panessiti

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty lunch bag
customer_reviews.text: Igloo cooler/ lunch bag is big enough to keep a full lunch cold and also hold a thermos/water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: 16 cans my foot
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because my first one lasted over 3 years with daily use. I especially like the second compartment in the top. But, I don't see any way 16 cans, unless they're 8 ounce or smaller, could fit. I'd say 12 at the most
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room, sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Love this lunch box for my husband... This is just what we were looking for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Igloo Playmate Gripper Maxcold 16 Black
product_meta.description:
Color:blackMaxCold insulation with 25 percent more foam. Separate insulated storage in tent top compartment. Ergonomic, comfort grip handle. Front and back slip pockets. Leak resistant, antimicrobial soft liner. 16 can capacity.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Igloo

Separate insulated storage in tent-top compartment.
Front and back slip pockets.MaxCold insulation - 25 more foam - stay cooler larger.
